title: Is burning plastic waste a good idea? - National Geographic
body: A plastic pollution treaty, called Paris Plus, would come with a mandate—and more muscle than the climate accord. How a dramatic win in plastic waste case may curb ocean pollution.
readable_content: - Elizabeth Royte (2023-12-08): This article discusses the potential environmental impact of burning plastic waste for energy generation. It highlights the challenges and controversies surrounding waste-to-energy projects and the various technologies involved, such as incineration, gasification, and pyrolysis. The article also delves into the debate around whether plastic waste should be considered a renewable resource and the concerns raised by zero-waste advocates.
